name: cast_vote
attributes: # [doc = " DAO 提案に賛成／反対の投票を行うが、"]
# [doc = " vote_account.owner と ctx.accounts.voter.key() の照合チェックがない"]
body: let vote_acc = & mut ctx . accounts . vote_account ;
vote_acc . for_votes = vote_acc . for_votes . checked_add (1) . unwrap () ;
vote_acc . against_votes = vote_acc . against_votes . checked_add (1) . unwrap () ;
vote_acc . total_votes = vote_acc . total_votes . checked_add (1) . unwrap () ;

fields.name: vote_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] を指定して投票者との照合を行うべき"]

fields.name: voter
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 投票を行うユーザー（署名者）"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来はこの投票権を保持するユーザーの Pubkey"]
